summary: An aging gambler and womanizer returns home after 20 years, haunted by the suicide of his friend.
cast: Dragan Nikolic|Maja Sabljic|Branislav Lecic|Katarina Radivojevic|Svetozar Cvetkovic|Josif Tatic|Ivan Zaric|Ana Stefanovic|Dejan Lutkic|Gordan Kicic|Olja Pesic|Sonja Vukicevic|Vlasta Velisavljevic|Ljubomir Todorovic|Goran Sultanovic|Dejan Petosevic|Djordje Brankovic|Nenad Okanovic|Milos Timotijevic
title: Lavirint
